My name is Matt Mills. I spit hot photos.

bridge on the #rideforsanity

this was on my first ride of the river trail for the season; I go out there once or twice a week and ride my troubles away. Or at least regain some calm and focus and put things into perspective. As I said somewhere near the inception of the five years blog that preceded this one, “Midnight bike rides fix Everything.” While they don’t, in fact, they always make me feel better.
